abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.74.2 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.74.3
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.74.2 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.74.2 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug in labelling figure inside appendix inside article inside book.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.74.2 release.

screen.phrase: Add better pointer to README for XSLTHL
More tweaking the way that XSLTHL does or does not get called
Alternate attempt at sanely including/excluding XSLTHT code

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.74.2 release.

screen.phrase: Add better pointer to README for XSLTHL
Another stab at fixing the stupid XSLTHT includes across processors (Saxon regression reported by Sorin Ristache)
More tweaking the way that XSLTHL does or does not get called
Alternate attempt at sanely including/excluding XSLTHT code

sect2.title: Highlighting
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the highlighting code since the 1.74.2 release.

screen.phrase: Alternate attempt at sanely including/excluding XSLTHT code
